title: $2,400 / 2br - 980ft2 - furnished entire condo in Medford Sq. - Sept 1
posting_body: ['I’m a retiree living half of the year overseas.', 'I have an updated and clean condo in Medford Sq.', 'across from the newly constructed Medford library.', 'Info on the condo:', '2 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom furnished condo on the bus line and walking distance to Medford Sq., near Tufts campus and Davis Sq.', 'Rent is $2400 per month', 'It comes with a private parking spot.', 'Available starting Sept 1st.', 'Minimum 6 months stay.', 'Max 12 months.', 'Send me an email to inquire.', 'No pets and no smoking please.', 'This unit is on the top floor of an apartment building (2 flights of stairs).', 'Washer/dryer is available on ground floor of building.', 'Payment terms:', '$500 deposit to reserve the apartment.', "First + Last month's rent to take over the keys", 'Plus $300 security deposit (will be returned upon inspection after departure).', 'Utilities: Heat, hot water and WiFi is included.', 'NO Pets', 'NO Smoking', 'Distance to Davis Sq. is 2 miles.']
